summary: A werewolf dual wielding redguard warrior level 25
descriptionHtml:
So, there is my lovely Redguard, I hope you will like him.

He\'s a dual wielding werewolf combat guy, with light armor (I was expecting to make him like... Some stealthy warrior, not such a thief maybe more like assassin and warr at the same time). 
The name of the savefile is a little different, only because my game is in differend language.

I upload some pics later, right now my internet connection just sux, but you guys can still upload some of it, I\'ll check it and if it will be the right one, it will be very helpful for me :)

So some informations about that guy:

-About 1/4 quests done with main story, so you can still enjoy your playing :)
-factions : Legion, thieves guild leader / nightingale, dark brotherhood, companions and some othhers :) . 
-There is a lot of weapons in 2 houses of mine (Solitude and Whiterun) they are in the chests, and some of it are on dummies, solitude house, downstairs.
-They are some skills in One hand weapons and light armor, I don\'t really remember, you can still check it ;)
-2 houses buyed with all the avaiable stuff (Whiterun, Solitude)
Questions? PM me, or use the comments :)
author: DinoGoesRawr
